## Lists and Tasks

### Deadlines
```base
formulas:
  Days: deadline.relative()
  overdue: if(formula.Days.toString().contains("ago"), "!!!", "~")
properties:
  file.name:
    displayName: File
  file.mtime:
    displayName: Modified today
  file.folder:
    displayName: Folder
  note.deadline:
    displayName: Deadline
  formula.Days:
    displayName: Due...
  formula.overdue:
    displayName: Prio
views:
  - type: table
    name: Default view
    filters:
      and:
        - "!deadline.isEmpty()"
        - status != true
    order:
      - file.name
      - deadline
      - formula.Days
      - formula.overdue
      - tags
    sort:
      - property: deadline
        direction: ASC
    columnSize:
      file.name: 213
      file.folder: 159
  - type: table
    name: View

```
### Notes created today
```base
formulas:
  Days: deadline.relative()
properties:
  file.name:
    displayName: File
  file.ctime:
    displayName: Created
  file.folder:
    displayName: Folder
  note.creation date:
    displayName: Created
  note.deadline:
    displayName: Deadline
  formula.Days:
    displayName: Something due...
views:
  - type: table
    name: Default view
    filters:
      and:
        - file.ctime == this.file.name
    order:
      - file.name
      - file.folder
      - formula.Days
    sort:
      - property: creation date
        direction: DESC
    columnSize:
      file.name: 243
      file.folder: 239

```
